title: MQM’s Arslan Pervaiz wins PS-98 election
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 9 (APP): Muttahida Qaumi Movement (MQM), Arslan Pervaiz has won the Sindh Assembly election from PS-98, Karachi East-II, by securing 13,903 votes.
According to the unofficial result issued by the Returning Officer/ECP, his runner-up was Hamad-ullah-Khan, Jamat e Islami (JI), who bagged 5,551 votes.
Overall voters’ turn-out remained 34.74%.
